 1998-08751998-05-150,  PMO,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of the following persons as governors of the Canadian Centre for Management Development, to hold office during pleasure, for a term of three years. (ROBERT J. GIROUX, of Gatineau, Quebec; ARTHUR KROEGER, of Ottawa, Ontario; JOHN EDWARDS, of Ottawa, Ontario; and DONALD JOSEPH SAVOIE, of Ottawa, Ontario, effective May 18, 1998)
